segments.text: Wow ! Your fruit looks really fresh ! How much are these apples ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The apples are 30NT each . How many would you like ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Let's see , 30NT is about ... almost a dollar US . What ? ! How about these pineapples ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: They're 250NT each , but they're not edible . They're only used for worship .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Hmm , 250NT is ... 8 dollars ? ! ! And you can't even eat them ? You're crazy !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Wait ! Don't go just yet . These bananas are pretty cheap--only 35NT for this bunch .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Now that's more like it ! Bananas have lots of potassium , too !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: They're also good for your digestion ! Would you like some kiwis , too ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: They're imported from New Zealand . Four for 50NT . Nine for a hundred .
segments.speaker: S2
